FuncDef: The reset mpls te auto-primary-tunnel command restarts a specified automatic primary tunnel.
Examples: <HUAWEI> reset mpls te auto-primary-tunnel name AutoTunnel32769
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If errors occur in services transmitted on a P2P TE tunnel and the services cannot be restored, run the reset mpls te auto-primary-tunnel command in the user view to reestablish the P2P TE tunnel to restore the services.
Configuration Impact
After this command is run, all LSPs in the specified tunnel are torn down and reestablished. If some LSPs are transmitting traffic, the operation causes a traffic interruption. Exercise caution when using this command.
